record.id: field.name="istatus" and file.name="device" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: istatus
record.file.name: device

brief.brief: The status of the configuration item.

detail.detail: Planned/On order: A plan to implement this CI is underway, and depending on approvals, the CI may be on order.
Received: New item received (through a goods receipt procedure or from development).
In Stock: CI is packed in its box, ready to be deployed or installed.
Reserved: CI is being reserved for future use.
In Use: CI is in place and operational.
Maintenance: CI is being repaired, or has been returned to the manufacturer or vendor for repairs or replacement.
Disposed/Retired: CI is obsolete and has been removed from service.
Available: CI is ready and available for use, but is not currently installed, for example, when the CI is stored in a stock room.
